column4: question - i want to install kubuntu-desktop but keep the ubuntu splash and loading screens (not kubuntu) at boot time, can i do that?
if you're not using apt packages keep stuff in /usr/local
I have Ubuntu and manually saved the xubuntu splash (like the blue more than brown).  Look in /usr/share/images/xsplash
It's not so much select at boot, but rewrite the images to the ones you want.  Mine's basically the blue xubuntu tree img but with Ubuntu's Gnome login.
